TextLibrary.Text: LYDIA
ED24 seems a bit... unusual.
ED24 seems a bit... unusual.
Programmed him myself. Helps to have somebody to talk smack with; I get bored on the station. Which brings me to my next point...
Programmed him myself. Helps to have somebody to talk smack with; I get bored on the station. Which brings me to my next point...
Which is?
Which is?
My fee for helping you.
My fee for helping you.
Your fee? I thought we all worked for the MRI Corporation?
Your fee? I thought we all worked for the MRI Corporation?
We do. But you're getting special service here, kid. So you gotta pay extra.
We do. But you're getting special service here, kid. So you gotta pay extra.
Okay... what then?
Okay... what then?
I want out of the Erebus System. Me and ED.
I want out of the Erebus System. Me and ED.
Why? And where will you go?
Why? And where will you go?
Something's going down, kid. The LeapGates... the Pirates... I've been around long enough to know something's not right.
Something's going down, kid. The LeapGates... the Pirates... I've been around long enough to know something's not right.
You want to go back to the Serpens System? Or Ceti?
You want to go back to the Serpens System? Or Ceti?
For now I'll just tag along with you, kid. I like this ship, and you're a pretty decent pilot. We might even be able to do a spot of mining while we go.
For now I'll just tag along with you, kid. I like this ship, and you're a pretty decent pilot. We might even be able to do a spot of mining while we go.
I can take you as far as Serpens Prime when this mission ends. I can't promise anything else after that.
I can take you as far as Serpens Prime when this mission ends. I can't promise anything else after that.
I'll bet you a fist-sized chunk of Jarricite that's not how it plays out kid. But sure, that's all I'm asking. We've got a deal?
I'll bet you a fist-sized chunk of Jarricite that's not how it plays out kid. But sure, that's all I'm asking. We've got a deal?
Okay, deal.
Okay, deal.
